messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Greetings Crew. I am your mute captain this shift. Please stay calm and do your jobs. Also, i won't call the shuttle. Have a fantastic day!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Fourteen Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Fourteen Station 13's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: T-This-s is y-your c-cap-pt-tain-n s-sp-peak-kin-n-n-ng-g ag-g-gain-n. I need-d hugs-s. W-We n-n-need h-hug-g-gs-s-s. Y-You n-need-d-d h-h-hug-g-gs-s-s-s. They-y n-need h-hug-gs-s. An-nd-d-d-d that-t's-s-s t-th-he ver-rb-b-b n-need-d-d conug-gation.
